com.revolsys.util

Class UrlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.util.UrlUtil

  • public final class UrlUtil
extends Object
    The UrlUtil class is a utility class for processing and create URL strings.
    Author:
    Paul Austin
